title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 59 - State Boat-launching Sites, Fishing-access Sites and Fishing Rights Areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 59 - State Boat-launching Sites, Fishing-access Sites and Fishing Rights Areas

State Regulations
§ 59.1 - Regulations
§ 59.2 - Boat motors at fishing-access sites
§ 59.3 - Prohibition on use of water craft propelled by gasoline powered motors at fishing access sites
§ 59.4 - Aquatic invasive species control at state boat launching and fishing access sites

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 59

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§3-0301, 9-0105, 11-0303, 11-0305, 11-0317, 11-0325, 11-1301, 11-1303, 11-1316, 11-2101

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
